name: Twin Stick Duckbox
description:
Kill Enemies, Earn Weapons, Survive:

In Twin Stick Duckbox your goal is to get the highest score possible, by earning weapons. Weapons are dropped by killing enemies and each weapon earns you one point. 

How far can you get ?!

Controls: Developers:

Team - Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Men

Buas - IGAD- Y2A - System Design

the main focus on this project was to gain an understanding of GD Script & Godot.

Developer:Weapon:Enemy:Davy Baak:Suction BeamNope RopeJesse Stolk:Gauss GunChomperMartin Vetsin:Boomerang ThiefHidde Derks:Swarm GunBlackholeJip Crombag:SeekerOverheat
